title: Research Topic: Russian Media Capture Innovation System (1999-2008)
summary: Based on the research priority 'Russian Media Capture Innovation System (1999-2008)', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Map Putin's systematic media domination strategy that improved upon Western privatization models through harassment, regulatory pressure, and forced sales... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
